filesystem   to  fit  in  a  partition  whose  size  is SIZE[k|M|G] bytes by shifting its end and keeping its  beginning unchanged.  The filesystem size is set to be at least one sector smaller than the partition.  The optional modifiers k, M, G mean the SIZE parameter is given in kilo-, mega- or gigabytes respec‐ tively.  Conforming to standards,  k=10^3,  M=10^6  and  G=10^9. ki=2^10,  Mi=2^20  and Gi=2^30 are also allowed. Use this option with --no-action first.
Long named options can be  abbreviated  to any unique prefix of their name.
